charges.charge_description: 18:2113A.F BANK ROBBERY BY FORCE OR VIOLENCE(2)

charges.charge_disposition: Imprisonment: 61 months consecutive to service of the State sentence in Case No. 23417-CFA which defendant is now serving. The Court recommends confinement where defendant may be afforded substance abuse therapy. Supervised Release: 2 years. Special Conditions of Supervised Release: Defendant shall participate in a program for treatment of narcotic addiction or drug or alcohol dependency and contribute to costs of such program; defendant shall participate in a program of mental health treatment and contribute to costs of such program. Restitution: $1,363.95. Special Assessment: $100.00. **10/5/05 ORDER entered revoking supervised release - defendant shall be incarcerated for a term of 7 months.**

charges.charge_description: 18:2113A.F BANK ROBBERY BY FORCE OR VIOLENCE(1)

charges.charge_disposition: Dismissed on motion of the U. S. Attorney
